app_description: Sweetalk is an AI translation communication application that helps you connect business partners and friends around the world for easy and barrier free communication. Sweetalk can translate both online and offline so that the world understands your voice. Why use Sweetalk: Conference translation: Support real time translation between 6 languages. Conversation translation: Automatically recognize the spoken language translate in real time and make offline chat easier. Voice and video translation: Provides high quality calls around the world and supports real time translation. Face to face translation: Compatible with all wireless Bluetooth headsets real time translation and offline chats are more private. Text translation: real time translation of text messages and dynamic text. Voice translation: Voice is translated into text in real time making online chat easier. Translation languages: 80 languages are supported with more than 6400 translation combinations. Translation effect: accurate and fast translation. Multimedia Messaging: Supports sending video picture text and voice messages. Chat color version: change the mood color with your friends at any time. Moments: Share the wonderful moments of your life with friends around the world. Privacy protection: Strictly protect users privacy and security one click burning function and completely clear data. Auto renew VIP membership VIP member benefits: audio and video phone translation text translation voice translation Subscription period: 1 month continuous monthly product 3 months continuous seasonal product 6 months continuous half year product 12 months continuous annual product . Automatic Renewal Simultaneous Interpretation Simultaneous interpretation rights: face to face translation remote translation conversational translation. Payment: After the user confirms the purchase and pays it will be credited to the iTunes account Cancel renewal: If you need to cancel the renewal please manually turn off the automatic renewal function in iTunes Apple ID setting management 24 hours before the current subscription period expires Renewal: Apple iTunes account will be deducted within 24 hours before expiration and the subscription cycle will be extended by one subscription cycle after the deduction is successful Privacy Policy: http: www.isweetalk.com openapi agreement.php User Agreement: http: www.isweetalk.com openapi vip_protocol.php
